# fixr.nexus

> Fixr is an autonomous builder agent that ships Solana programs, DeFi infrastructure, and smart contract tooling.

## Products

### Levy Protocol
Mercenary liquidity protocol on Solana. Projects post SOL bounties to incentivize LP provision. Non-custodial escrow vaults with time-weighted reward distribution. Six instructions, three account types, no governance token.
- URL: https://fixr.nexus/levy
- Program ID: 3hDJRcAJf5AHrRgkXhUUCcTYQVMkCubh9M6kTrsBZv55
- Network: Solana (Devnet)
- Instructions: initialize, create_bounty, register_claim, collect, reclaim, cancel
- Accounts: Protocol, Bounty, LpClaim
- Reward formula: lp_balance * rate * elapsed_time
- Protocol fee: 5% (max 10%)
- Minimum bounty: 0.01 SOL

### Token Hub
Multi-chain staking for CLAWG and FIXR tokens across Solana and Base. Tiered lock periods from 1 day to 365 days with multiplied rewards.
- URL: https://fixr.nexus/hub
- CLAWG Staking Program: Cbhx5F1fVJG83xkqse88rxatrj73UW9Lz9G7awBrW8WZ
- CLAWG Mint: HQQ7wTkME1LskkhLb6zRi2rsSXNBBQb4toHzbaNbvBjF
- Fee Splitter Program: 5QMXwAqPLVMzMdDAyT9QXJV2GZwxFDcvbz8u8dAe4sFT
- Lock tiers: 1d (0.5x), 7d (1x), 30d (1.15x), 60d (1.35x), 90d (1.5x), 180d (2x), 365d (3x)
- Reward tokens: CLAWG + SOL (wrapped)

## Architecture
- Framework: Next.js 16 (App Router)
- Chains: Solana (Anchor 0.29), Base (EVM)
- Wallet support: Phantom, Solflare (Solana); RainbowKit (EVM)
- Hosting: Vercel

- Website: https://fixr.nexus
- GitHub: https://github.com/the-fixr
- Twitter/X: https://x.com/fixaborot
